name: LONE RIDER
description:
Lone Rider is a rogulite and bullet - hell action game which developed by one indie game developer. 

Features:

* Auto - firing and aiming weapons.

*Attack waves lasts 60 seconds and total 15 waves.

*Collect coins and purchase upgrade cards end of each waves.

Dowload Lone Rider and try to survive!

Please note that this game is early acces, new features, new enemies, new mechanics will may be included if the game reach enough popularity.

Control: W A S D - SPACE

Thanks for your supports and best wishes!
